summary: This makes Cosnach from Markath look like Theoden from Lotr
descriptionHtml:
Cosnach now reborn as Theoden is a Companion available in Markath by fighting with him. He has the same stats as always but maybe i will change this in a further update.

Have  fun

Requirements:
NO MORE BLOCKY FACE - <Website>http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=30</Website>




Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim
Thanks to Xenius for No More Blocky Faces
author: JustxxxChaos
